snippet: Iran’s foreign minister, Mohammad Javad Zarif, told NBC News that one lesson of the Sept. 11 attack was “That an island of security in an unsecure world is impossible.”
abstract: Iran’s foreign minister, Mohammad Javad Zarif, told NBC News that one lesson of the Sept. 11 attack was “That an island of security in an unsecure world is impossible.”

headline.main: Iran's Foreign Minister Invokes 9/11 Attack to Argue for Collective Security
